name: Res Militaria Rome 4X
description:
Res Militaria Rome 4X (Explore\Expand\Exploit\Exterminate) is a realtime grand strategy game. The battle engine used in the tactic map is turn based (the same of Res Militaria wargame collection).

The game uses a realtime infinite map, procedurally built using simplex noise algorithm. The player has to explore the map looking for places to create buildings for producing resources.

All the available resources are: money, food, wood and minerals. They are used to build: villages, farms, sawmills, markets and mines or for unit creation.

Inside the village building, is possible to create units: 1) worker for creating other buildings 2) army to defend or attack, it is possible to upgrade it with infantry, archers and cavalry 

The app collects some usage statistics, the user can disable this behaviour in the settings screen.
